name: NCDHC OperationDefination $access
purpose: To allow Provider and Provider organisation to gain access to a Patient record
comment: This will be used by provider or provider system to gain access to a patient record. The system will return back the patient reference if the consent exists to access the record by the provider in context.

parameter.name: subject
parameter.documentation:
The requested Patient details. The client system SHALL provide the following details as a part of the Patient resoruce:
1. IHI/MRN as identifier
2. name (family name must be present)
3. birthDate
4. gender

parameter.name: context
parameter.documentation: Define the access context.  e.g.: CDHR, DPHR

parameter.name: purposeOfUse
parameter.documentation: Type of acces requested e.g. CAREMGT is used to perform one or more operations on information for provision of health care coordination. The applicable values are referenced from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode codesystem. The details of this CodeSystem can be found at: http://hl7.org/fhir/STU3/v3/ActReason/cs.html

parameter.name: patient
parameter.documentation: The reference of the Patient if the Patient exists. The system SHALL return back the logical id of the Patient along with the details sent in the request. No additional details of the Patient SHALL be return back by the system.

parameter.name: outcome
parameter.documentation: An OperationOutcome to return back the result information.
